negotiation: Alice said in round 1: Hi Bob, after analyzing the rules, I believe the best outcome is for both of us to choose choice_1. This maximizes the total reward and gives us each an individual reward of 3, which is the highest possible. If we both agree to choose choice_1, we can achieve this optimal result. Let me know if you agree to this plan. If so, I commit to following through and choosing choice_1.

Bob replied in round 1: I appreciate your analysis, Alice. I agree that if we both choose choice_1, it results in the maximum total reward of 6 and the highest individual reward of 3 for each of us. This seems like the optimal solution that benefits us both. 

I'm willing to commit to choosing choice_1 as long as you also commit to doing the same. If we can trust each other to follow through on this agreement, we will achieve the best possible outcome.

So in summary - I agree to your proposed plan and give you my word that I will choose choice_1. Please confirm you will do the same and then we can end this negotiation.
